alert.note: Alert for Grant (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 06 at 1:29AM CST until November 06 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * AFFECTED AREA...Grant county in west central Minnesota. * TIMING...Sunday afternoon. * WINDS...West 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...as low as 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the lower 40s. * IMPACTS...Any fire may spread rapidly when ignited.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
